name: ruminatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are thinking deeply, often for a long period: He chewed ruminatively on the lid of his pen. We gazed at our plates ruminatively.
More examplesFewer examplesThe man nodded his head ruminatively before replying.She sipped her coffee and ruminatively unwrapped a biscuit. The music begins quietly and ruminatively.The inspector rubbed his chin ruminatively. I sat in the café, ruminatively chewing on a giant cheese and ham sandwich.He gazed ruminatively after the retreating figure.
